attributes.action: investigate the allocation of tickets for the Radio 1 big weekend as i live in Maidstone and didnt get tickets and neither did nearly everyone i know
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition if you live in Maidstone or even anywhere else but are unhappy about how tickets were allocated and hopefully we can get some more tickets released

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
